name: Amsterdam sofa with footstool on left side
description: The Amsterdam sofa features a voluminous form, inviting look, and sweeping curves, making it an elegant statement in your living room. It is crafted for optimal comfort with a mix of hypersoft foam and down, extra padding in the armrests and backrests, and slim high legs for a striking visual impact. The design includes piped seams, tufted seats, and flexible cushions with a bolster for varying seating comforts.
